Union Bank FC bụ otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria nke dị na Lagos ma bụrụ nke Union Bank of Nigeria nke na-ejikwa ọtụtụ ndị otu egwuregwu ndị ọzọ.
Klọb ahụ gbara bọọlụ n'afọ iri mbụ nke senchiri nke iri abụọ na otu maka oge ole na ole na ọkwa nke abụọ nke bọọlụ Naijiria, National Division 1
N'ikpeazụ, a chụpụrụ ha na ọkwa nke atọ nke Nigeria Amateur League mgbe oge 2008 gasịrị.
Union Bank FC meriri nkwalite ọzọ na 2013 mana ha rere ebe nke abụọ ha na Stationery Stores FC
Kama nke ahụ, klọb ahụ sonyeere Metro Pro League, otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ọhụrụ na-agba ọsọ na Lagos
N'ọnwa Jụn afọ 2014, klọb ahụ nwetara otu asọmpi nke egwuregwu a, n'ihu Bridge FC, nke a maara dị ka Julius Berger
Ha abụọ, league na Union Bank FC bu ndị agbasara mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị.
Ndị Naijiria mba ụwa Ayila Yussuf na Bernard Okorowanta malitere ọrụ ha na mbido afọ 2000 na klọb ahụ.
